With experience in modern technologies like JavaScript, React, and Python, combined with a unique perspective from working in healthcare, I love creating solutions that make a real impact. When I'm not coding, I enjoy discovering new cafes and restaurants, attending concerts, and baking. Thanks for stopping by my portfolio, and let's connect soon!

projects.title: NetStix
projects.description: A gaming application that allows users to browse games and leave reviews. This application provides features such as game search and filtering, game details and reviews, user authentication and authorization, and user review submission and management. This platform provides a user-friendly and engaging experience for gamers, enabling them to discover and review games easily and connect with other gamers.

projects.title: MotorMatters
projects.description: A car dealership management system that allows employees to manage appointments, inventory, and services. This application provides a comprehensive solution for dealership management, enabling employees to manage different aspects of the dealership's operations and improve the overall customer experience.

projects.title: ConferenceConnect
projects.description: A conference application that allows people to sign up for conferences and presentations. The conference application provides a comprehensive solution for conference planning and management, enabling organizers to create and manage events easily and attendees to discover and register for events that align with their interests and preferences.
